id: Turn Your Life Into a RPG (FREE Notion Template + Training)
name: Turn Your Life Into a RPG (FREE Notion Template + Training)
description: What if you could reach maximum productivity by hacking your mind to enjoy everything you do?#theGamificationProject transforms you into a game character, turning tedious tasks into fun and engaging quests that build up your skill tree and includes live leaderboard functionalities to promote friendly competitions between friends, family, and community.Our templates have been meticulously designed to integrate with any task database and daily habit tracker to turn your life into a RPG.1.
